name: Professionalism Check
prompt:
Evaluate the professionalism and appropriateness of the language used in the following meeting minutes document. Consider factors such as:

- Use of appropriate business language and tone
- Respectful communication between participants
- Professional terminology and expression
- Absence of casual or overly informal language inappropriate for business records
- Overall tone and presentation suitable for organizational documentation

Rate the document on a scale of 0-100 where:
- 0-39: Highly unprofessional language, inappropriate for business context
- 40-59: Somewhat unprofessional or overly casual for business documentation
- 60-69: Mostly professional with some informal elements
- 70-89: Professional language with minor style improvements possible
- 90-100: Exemplary professional communication throughout

You MUST respond with ONLY a single integer number between 0 and 100. Do not include any explanation, text, or additional characters. Just the number.
assistant_prompt: I will evaluate the professionalism and respond with only a single number from 0 to 100:
